data.title: UEFA Europa League and UEFA Europa Conference League last 16 live – Liverpool, West Ham and Aston Villa reach last eight as Brighton and Rangers bow out
data.meta_description: Eurosport is your go-to source for breaking Football headlines, including what's happening in Europa League live updates. Watch replays, interviews and highlights.
data.text:
We will be back at 11am on Friday morning when we have the quarter-final draws for the UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference League live from Nyon in Switzerland on TNT Sports.

discovery+ is the streaming home of TNT Sports, the only place to watch the UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference League live.

discovery+ is the streaming home of TNT Sports, the only place to watch the UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference League live.

"Mo is a very experienced player, I told him if he has to stay on then he may have to play the full match," said Klopp on TNT Sports. "It was the first time I told someone to stop defending. He actually then nearly made a wonderful goal, but Cody was offside. He's very experienced. He got easily got it over the line."

"Good spirit, good quality and I think we made it really difficult for them," said the Villa winger on TNT Sports. "I was just happy I could get the second goal because it was really needed."

discovery+ is the streaming home of TNT Sports, the only place to watch the UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference League live.

Brighton exited the UEFA Europa League at the round-of-16 stage despite beating Serie A side AS Roma 1-0 at the Amex. Trailing 4-0 from the first leg, Danny Welbeck’s first-half beauty gave The Seagulls hope, but Daniele De Rossi’s side firmed up defensively to hold on to their three-goal lead. It signals an end to what was an unforgettable European debut for the south coast side. Read more here:

A devastating second half attacking display saw Aston Villa book their place in the UEFA Europa Conference League quarter-finals courtesy of a 4-0 second leg win over Ajax. Goals from Ollie Watkins, Leon Bailey, Jhon Duran and Moussa Diaby saw Villa through as Sivert Mannsverk saw red for the visitors. Read more here:

Sent off in his side's 4-0 loss to Tottenham in the Premier League on Sunday, the Villa captain helped Unai Emery's side bounce back with a 4-0 win over Ajax in the UEFA Conference League.

"A great performance, and a good reaction from the weekend," said McGinn on TNT Sports. "One that certainly stung us. Great night at Villa Park with players getting confidence. Tonight was a professional performance."

Liverpool’s UEFA Europa League last-16 second-leg tie with Sparta Prague was only 14 minutes old when the hosts found themselves 4-0 up, through a mixture of chaotic defending and sublime finishing. Mo Salah scored to break a club record, while Bobby Clark got his first-ever goal for Liverpool. Also on target were Darwin Nunez, Cody Gakpo (2) and Dominik Szoboszlai. Read more here:

discovery+ is the streaming home of TNT Sports, the only place to watch the UEFA Europa League and UEFA Conference League live.

So near yet so far for Qarabag. Patrik Schick with a second goal in added time. Surely the winner with the header from the Czech striker. That is a remarkable finish. Leverkusen with a 5-4 aggregate win against the 10 men.
